extendedInfo.description: Access Carnegie Library of Pittsburgh (CLP) right from your mobile device! Search for books, music, DVDs, audiobooks, upcoming events and more. Log into your account and check holds or renew items. You can follow us on Facebook and Twitter. Find contact and location information, hours and directions, even text us with a question! Take CLP with you wherever you go and have the whole Library at your fingertips!

reviews.comment: I love booklook, makes it so easy to find books I don\'t want to buy. I can check events, hold books, renew items, use the catalog and more. LOVE THIS APP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: So much easier than trying to access on the regular browser on my phone. The barcode scan option is genius, I see myself using it a great deal!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Renewal slower than website
reviews.comment: For my purposes, primarily renewing books, the app can\'t compete with the website. There\'s simply no way to renew multiple books at a time, have to wait through a painful process for each book individually. I had the impression that the purpose of mobile apps was to reduce bandwidth and to make common tasks more clear-cut and/or readable, and this isn\'t firing on all cylinders, missing this second improvement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: So much easier to read on my tablet.  Best way to search for books and access your account.  Great App! Update: added it to my HTC phone and works just as well.  Wonderful!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Library Love
reviews.comment: This is a really useful app. I can be out of state and renew books we brought with us, and request books or movies. I can pull up within seconds when our library closes and so much more. This has been so helpful for our library lovin\' family.   The only thing I wish it had (and this may have to happen with the system before it can happen with the app) is a count of how many people are in front of me for a requested item. It would just be nice to know and help keep me or others patient.
reviews.author: Joe Allyn

reviews.title: Main menu will not open
reviews.comment: Main menu will not load.  It did in the past. But nowt just stop working.  I even re installed the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than the website... that\'s not saying much.
reviews.comment: When I first downloaded this app, it worked like a breeze, but with each week since, it has gotten slower and slower. What used to be instantaneous search results now take two minutes or longer. Strange bug where it logs you out sporadically, and logs you in as someone seemingly named \"I Have An Account\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bionic
reviews.comment: Working great for me. Able to manage my clp acct on the go without the awful browser experience.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great library app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and download books
reviews.author: A Google User
